Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit a double to left field, scoring Gleyber Torres and advancing Juan Soto to third base.
Austin Wells hit a single to left field, scoring Juan Soto and Aaron Judge.
Luis Gil pitched 6 innings, allowing only 1 hit and no runs while striking out 7 batters.
Luke Weaver earned his first save of the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was attended by 40,101 fans at Wrigley Field.
The game lasted 2 hours and 42 minutes.
The weather was 68°F with a wind of 16 mph from left to right and cloudy conditions.
